title: MrGunner2013
author: MrGunner2013
content: WTB: Mt. GOX yubikey, OTP card, mycelium entropy wallet. Also other historical memorabilia let me know what you have, maybe some FTX stuff.

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Quote from: MrGunner2013 on April 29, 2023, 05:21:54 PMWTB: Mt. GOX yubikey, OTP card, mycelium entropy wallet. Also other historical memorabilia let me know what you have, maybe some FTX stuff.There was a member selling a MtGox yubi key not long ago, I will link the thread if I find it.Good luck finding a Mycelium Entropy for sale, they are very rare and I still wish I never sold mine. If you find 2 for sale send me a PM

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on April 30, 2023, 08:30:32 AMQuote from: MrGunner2013 on April 29, 2023, 05:21:54 PMWTB: Mt. GOX yubikey, OTP card, mycelium entropy wallet. Also other historical memorabilia let me know what you have, maybe some FTX stuff.There was a member selling a MtGox yubi key not long ago, I will link the thread if I find it.Good luck finding a Mycelium Entropy for sale, they are very rare and I still wish I never sold mine. If you find 2 for sale send me a PM  Yes, I remember that MtGox yubi-key sale thread, too. But wasn't it just a regular yubi-key? I think there was no print or anything that made it distinguishable from a regular one, right?And what's an OTP card?

comments.author: MrGunner2013
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on April 30, 2023, 08:30:32 AMQuote from: MrGunner2013 on April 29, 2023, 05:21:54 PMWTB: Mt. GOX yubikey, OTP card, mycelium entropy wallet. If you find 2 for sale send me a PM  Appreciate it

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on April 30, 2023, 03:21:48 PMQuote from: CoinageMint on April 30, 2023, 08:30:32 AMQuote from: MrGunner2013 on April 29, 2023, 05:21:54 PMWTB: Mt. GOX yubikey, OTP card, mycelium entropy wallet. Also other historical memorabilia let me know what you have, maybe some FTX stuff.There was a member selling a MtGox yubi key not long ago, I will link the thread if I find it.Good luck finding a Mycelium Entropy for sale, they are very rare and I still wish I never sold mine. If you find 2 for sale send me a PM  Yes, I remember that MtGox yubi-key sale thread, too. But wasn't it just a regular yubi-key? I think there was no print or anything that made it distinguishable from a regular one, right?And what's an OTP card?    The OTP card is a ONE TIME PASSWORD card MTGOX came out with as follows..        Japan-based bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox has announced some new updates and features to its platform including a one-time password (OTP) card.This battery-powered password generator is linked to a user's account, and can be used for an additional layer of security, either by storing a unique password or generating a new one every time a user performs actions such as logging in or initiating a withdrawal online.The card costs $39.99 and is shipping now. For more information about the Mt. Gox OTP card, the exchange has produced a resource guide.     You can read more about it on my thread that I made years ago  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3557001.0     I was fortunate to be able to find two of these thru the years of hunting for them

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: eBay has a mt gox “ubikey”Go to the eBay site type in “mt gox” and some one is trying to get 500ish for it… good luck! Pro tip: it’s been on eBay for several months at 500… looks like they are now asking 515 and buy it now option at over 1k…

comments.body: Still looking to buy OTP card.

comments.author: stackinsats777
comments.body: Quote from: MrGunner2013 on June 19, 2023, 08:15:00 PMStill looking to buy OTP card.Does that mean you found a mycelium entropy?

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: OTP is much harder to come by from my experience in the past...I rarely ever saw them posted in here...maybe once a few years back.  Goodluck on your hunt for these historic relics....I would definitely search Ebay as well.
